Welcome to Citrus Smiles!

Buy Fresh Citrus Fruits Online

We are a leading online vendor for fresh, healthy, quality citrus fruits. We sell a wide variety of various citrus fruits in bulk for great prices. Trust that the absolute best fruits will be delivered right to your door for your enjoyment.

Pick of the Month

Valencia Oranges

Valencia oranges are small to medium sized, and they may have a few seeds. If you're craving sweet and flavorful fresh OJ, squeeze some Valencias. You'll get lots of juice from each one!

Shop Now!

Persian Limes

Large, thick-skinned and bright green in color. For the best Margarita you've ever tasted, pass on the bottled mix and use fresh-squeezed lime juice, sweetened to taste.

4 for $5

Buy Now!

Pummelos

Sometimes referred to as a Chinese grapefruit, they have a thick yet smooth green skin. The taste of pummelo is unique, aromatic, sweeter and less acidic than grapefruit.

2 for $5.00

Buy Now!

Satsuma Mandarins

The first mandarin of the season. The Satsuma peels and segments easily. The exterior will display a light orange color and perhaps a tinge of green, but the interior will be a bright orange.

$5/box

Buy Now!
